verbs.description: [V: sound] [ARG2: the alarm] blues [ARGM-DIS: yeo] [ARGM-TMP: next] [ARGM-PRP: to go it the team underachieving putrid play that saw a throng of folk one that included general manager doug armstrong exiting the arena en masse well in advance of a brutal uninspired 7 - 4 loss to columbus]
